      • getAlign

        public static void getAlign(AFPChain afpChain,
            Atom[] ca1,
            Atom[] ca2)
        //extract the alignment output // eg // STWNTWACTWHLKQP--WSTILILA // 111111111111 22222222 // SQNNTYACSWKLKSWNNNSTILILG // those position pairs labeled by 1 and 2 are equivalent positions, belongs to // two blocks 1 and 2. The residues between labeled residues are non-equivalent, // with '-' filling in their resulting gaps
